404.title: This is somewhat embarrassing, isn’t it?
404.sub_text: It looks like nothing was found at this location. Maybe try a search?

password_page.signup_form_success: We will send you an email right before we open!
password_page.admin_link_html: Are you the store owner? Log in here
password_page.powered_by_shopify_html: This shop will be powered by {{ shopify }}

search.title: Search our site
search.no_products_page: No products were found matching your selection.

comments.comments_note: Your email address will not be published. Required fields are marked
comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Please note, comments must be approved before they are published
comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

general.title: Cart
general.guest_note_html:
Before proceed to checkout you must add some products to your shopping cart.
You will find a lot of interesting products on our "Shop" page.

general.no_matches: No products were found matching your selection.

form.name: Your Name
form.post_success: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

activate_account.title: Activate Account
activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

addresses.infor: The following addresses will be used on the checkout page by default.
addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.delete_confirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this address?

orders.title: Order History :
orders.none: No order has been made yet.

recover_password.title: Reset your password
recover_password.subtext: Lost your password? Please enter your email address. You will receive a link to create a new password via email.
recover_password.success: We've sent you an email with a link to update your password.
recover_password.content_success: A password reset email has been sent to the email address on file for your account, but may take several minutes to show up in your inbox. Please wait at least 10 minutes before attempting another reset.

reset_password.title: Reset account password
reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

footer.instructions_for_linklist_html: Pick a link list to show here in your {{ theme_settings_link }} under {{ theme_settings_footer_linklist_path }}.
footer.instructions_for_text_content_html: Add some text to show here in your {{ theme_settings_link }}.

popup.added_to_cart: Product was successfully added to your cart.
popup.info_wishlist: Sign in to sync your Saved Items across all your devices.

product.wishlist-empty: No products were added to the wishlist
product.will_be_in_stock_after: Will be in stock after {{ date }}
product.low_stock_message: Hurry, there are only {{ quantity }} item(s) left!
product.instagram_intro_html: Tag your photos with {{has_tag}} on Instagram.
product.only_left: Hurry, there are only {{ count }} item(s) left!

wishlist.login_to_manage_wishlist: You must be logged in to manage your wishlist.
wishlist.info_wishlist: Sign in to sync your Saved Items across all your devices.
wishlist.no_products_wishlist: No products were added to the wishlist

compare.no_compare: No products added in the compare table.

issued.title_html: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem_html: Use this code at checkout to redeem your {{ value }} gift card
